short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View your github pull requests, approve, request changes or mentioned request and authentication via Firebase

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Git glance provides you a quick overview of pull requests that you have created, are assigned to, are mentioned in or that have requested a review from you. It uses firebase as authentication against Github.
